title: Herby Magny
text:
Herby Magny (born 28 December 1997) is a professional <a href="soccer">football</a> player from the <a href="Turks%20and%20Caicos%20Islands">Turks and Caicos Islands</a>, currently playing for the <a href="Turks%20and%20Caicos%20Islands%20national%20football%20team">Turks and Caicos Islands national team</a> as a <a href="Left%20Back">Left Back</a>. He plays mainly as a left back, but can also operate as a left winger.
Career.
International.
Magny made his senior international debut on 23 March 2015 in a 6-2 defeat to <a href="Saint%20Kitts%20and%20Nevis%20national%20football%20team">Saint Kitts and Nevis</a> during <a href="2018%20FIFA%20World%20Cup%20qualification%20%E2%80%93%20CONCACAF%20First%20Round">World Cup qualifying</a>.
